constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: SB1  South of the Borough
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Hip to gable roof extension with rear dormer extension, installation of 2no.x front rooflights and Juliet balcony to rear, to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable roof extension with rear dormer extension, installation of 2no.x front rooflights and Juliet balcony to rear, to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Condition 13 (Level) - Officers have reviewed the information submitted and are satisfied this can now be approved.
Existing Elevations - Please provide Existing Elevations at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing all elevations not just part. A scale bar is encouraged.
